name: BAI YUN® RTV Neutral Silicone Sealant 300ml Caulk For Windows And Doors SS550
description: BAI YUN® RTV Neutral Silicone Sealant 300ml Caulk For Windows And Doors SS550 Neutral Silicone Sealant is one-component, neutral curing, general purpose construction silicone sealant with good adhesion to glass, aluminum, cement, concrete etc., specially designed for sealing in all type door ,window and wall joints.
